728945f-a.title: Richmond: Hillside Terrace - Amboy Road
728945f-a.text:
22 Hillside Terrace, adjoining the S. W. corner of Amboy Road, showing the Christ Lutheran Church. The Church was formerly a
private residence.
May 6, 1930.
P. L. Sperr,
728945f-a.folder: Hillside Terrace & Amboy Road, Staten Island, NY
